verbose_text: Since other studies have provided evidence of an increased LRRK2 kinase activity in idiopathic PD patients, LRRK2 kinase mediated dysregulation of the endolysosomes may be a common event in the pathophysiology of PD.
evidence: LRRK2 kinase-mediated dysregulation of the endolysosomes may be a common event in the pathophysiology of PD
